unicef-ecd3.def: Attendance in early childhood education – Percentage of children 36–59 months old who are attending an early childhood education programme.
unicef-ecd3.name: Attendance in early childhood education
unicef-ecd3.source: Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS), Multiple Indicator Cluster Surveys (MICS), and other national surveys. Last update: June 2021.
unicef-ecd3.dataset: Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS), Multiple Indicator Cluster Surveys (MICS), and other national surveys. Last update: June 2021.
